wikipedia_page.main: Kevin Kiely (born 2 June 1953) is a poet, novelist, critic and playwright whose writings and public statements have met with controversy.

response: Kevin Kiely is an Irish politician and former Mayor of Limerick from 2009–10. He was made a Peace Commissioner in 1983 by the then Fine Gael Minister for Justice, Michael Noonan. He is a member of Fine Gael.
*The Leader Interview with Cllr Kevin Kiely, chairman of the joint policing committee The Limerick Leader, 15 May 2008
